0 / 1 => 1 bit. binary(2진수)


1 byte = 8 bit
00000000 ~ 11111111
0        ~ 255



1 1 1 1  1 1 1 1
         8 4 2 1
         
00 01 10 11
0  1  2  3

000 001 010 011 100 101 110 111
0   1   2   3   4   5   6   7

2^2 = 4 - 1
2^3 = 8 - 1
2^4 = 16 - 1
2^5 = 32 - 1
2^6 = 64 - 1
2^7 = 128 - 1
2^8 = 256 - 1
